00793 /* Inline Function definitions */
00794 
00795 static inline
00796 
00797 Uint16 MCBSP_xempty(CSL_McbspHandle hMcbsp)
00798 
00799 {
00800 
00801 
00802 
00803     /* Extract the XEMPTY bit */
00804 
00805     return((Uint16)(CSL_FEXT(hMcbsp->Regs->SPCRU,MCBSP_SPCRU_XEMPTY)));
00806 
00807 
00808 
00809 }
00810 
00811 
00812 
00813 static inline
00814 
00815 Uint16 MCBSP_xrdy(CSL_McbspHandle hMcbsp)
00816 
00817 {
00818 
00819     /* Extract the XRDY bit */
00820 
00821     return((Uint16)(CSL_FEXT(hMcbsp->Regs->SPCRU,MCBSP_SPCRU_XRDY)));
00822 
00823 }

00826
